snippet: An arbitrator in Philadelphia ruled in quarterback Drew Brees’s favor in a dispute over how much the Saints would have to pay him if they applied the franchise tag to him again in 2013.
abstract: Arbitrator rules in favor of New Orleans Saints quarterback Drew Brees in dispute over how much Saints would have to pay him if they apply the franchise tag to him again in 2013.
lead_paragraph: An arbitrator in Philadelphia ruled in quarterback Drew Brees’s favor in a dispute over how much the Saints would have to pay him if they applied the franchise tag to him again in 2013.

headline.seo: Drew Brees Wins Franchise Tag Ruling
